title: How to Build a Chair in Minecraft

steps.title: Make sure that you collect 3 trapdoors, 1 minecart, some rails, and a pickaxe of any type (optional).
steps.content: Make sure that you collect 3 trapdoors, 1 minecart, some rails, and a pickaxe of any type (optional).

steps.title: Place the three trapdoors in a box pattern so that the doors take on a chair-like formation.
steps.content: Place the three trapdoors in a box pattern so that the doors take on a chair-like formation. Leave the front side where you want your seat to be empty.

steps.title: Place the two rails facing towards the spot where you want to sit.
steps.content: Place the two rails facing towards the spot where you want to sit. A basic diagram is below. _ | | ^ The rails would be faced in the direction the small arrow ( ^ ) is.

steps.title: Place the minecart on the rail farthest away from your chair and push it into place.
steps.content: Place the minecart on the rail farthest away from your chair and push it into place. This can take a few attempts, so if at first you don't succeed, try, try again!

steps.title: Remove the rails, and voila!
steps.content: Remove the rails, and voila! A working chair in Minecraft!
